job.name: URL
job.description: Import files from a given URL using HTTP, HTTPS, or FILE protocols.

task.name: url-connector
task.description: $FILE_URL (required) designates a file or an archive on an Internet host accessible using HTTP, HTTPS, or FILE protocols. FTP and SFTP have to follow respectively, these format: FTP url ftp://<username>:<password>@<hostname>:<port>/<path> SFTP url sftp://<username>@<host>[:<port>][/<directory>] $FTP_LOCAL_RELATIVE_PATH (optional) is the local relative path from which we upload (or to which we download) file(s). LOCAL_RELATIVE_PATH can contain either a path to a file, a directory terminated by / or an empty value for the root. $EXTRACT_ARCHIVE is a boolean used only when $FTP_PORT=GET. If it is equal to True then, the imported file will be extracted if it is an archive.
